description:
The Marvel Cinematic Universe still has plenty of superheroes to bring to the screen. Especially now that Marvel Studios is beginning to introduce the X-Men, there are virtually no limits to how many characters they can adapt. As such, fans might be excited to learn that Taylor Swift has reportedly met with Marvel Studios boss [...]

The post Taylor Swift Reportedly Met With Kevin Feige To Discuss MCU Role appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Taylor Swift Reportedly Met With Kevin Feige To Discuss MCU Role
